transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Hanji. Hello?
Executive: Sir Durgesh bol raha hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Durgesh maine aapko keywords ki list bheji hai.
Executive: Ha aapne mujhe keywords WhatsApp pe mere ko share kiya hai aur ye keywords main kal tak main add kar dunga sir, theek hai? Aur jo bhi irrelevancy uh wo leads aa rahi hai wo aana band ho jayega irrelevancy leads. Okay? Aur jo bhi aapka keywords hai isse related main pura keyword add kar dunga sir. Okay? Kal tak main add kar dunga koi dikkat nahi hai.
Customer: Baki sara keyword hata dena. Hame sirf yahi keyword chahiye.
Executive: Ha wo sara cheez jo keyword hai yahi keyword yahi keyword main add kar dunga jo aapne mujhe share kiya hai aur jo bhi keyword waha pe hai update wo main hata dunga, theek hai? Aur jo aapne ticket open kiya hai sir usko main please main uh band kar du sir?
Customer: Aap yaar ye implement kar do uske baad kar dena na band.
Executive: Uh sir uh main kal tak ho jayega sir aap mera number aapne personal number to aapne rakh liya na? Aap mujhe direct kar lena dekho uh ultimately mere paas aata hai sir aisa nahi hai ki nahi aata hai aap mujhe directly call kar lena. Main kal tak sir main aapka pura product add kar dunga koi dikkat nahi hai sir.
Customer: Bas hame iske alawa koi lead aaye na bas.
Executive: Sir yehi main aapko uh kal update karke main video meeting pe dikha dunga ki jo jo aapne mujhe se uh share kiya hai uh leads sorry keywords usi se related main aapko uh video meeting pe aapko dikha dunga ki maine add kar diya hai sir. Aapka aapko hum sara cheeze wo kar dunga sir video meeting pe sara cheeze dikha dunga koi dikkat nahi hai.
Customer: Theek hai. Okay. Okay.
Executive: To ticket close kar du sir?
Customer: Ha kar dijiye abhi to.
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: Ha kar do abhi fir yaar ek do baat kal connect karte hai fir.
Executive: Ha ha ha sir main ticket close kar deta hu baki main pura product add kar dunga koi dikkat nahi keyword.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Okay sir. Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants only specific keywords to be added.

- Wants irrelevant leads to stop.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to add keywords by tomorrow.

- Executive offered to show the changes via video meeting.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will update the customer by tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- keywords, leads, video meeting, ticket
